mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_user (id, userName, userPwd, salt, name, tel, email, entryTime, organizationId, role_ids, locked, userPhoto) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrytime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{organizationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userphoto,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_user set userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userPwd = #{userpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entryTime = #{entrytime,jdbcType=DATE}, organizationId = #{organizationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_ids = #{roleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, userPhoto = #{userphoto,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userName, userPwd, salt, name, tel, email, entryTime, organizationId, role_ids, locked, userPhoto from tb_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, userName, userPwd, salt, name, tel, email, entryTime, organizationId, role_ids, locked, userPhoto from tb_user
select id, userName, userPwd, salt, name, tel, email, entryTime, organizationId, role_ids, locked, userPhoto from tb_user where userName = #{userName}
